channel.title: Adding magic icoons [317]
channel.description: i want to change my old rs317 magic icoons in the magic tab till the new 525`s how do i do that ? plz help

item.title: Adding magic icoons [317]
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

You have to open it up then click on the jar file named “Suite” it should be right there when you open it up. I will give you the link to a tut about it. just gimme a second

Edit:
Here is the link to a tut, but instead you will just be using it for a reference as this is a tut on how to change the hitmarks. But it is all the same except you need to change the icons http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422821

Make sure you back up your files before doing stuff this risky!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding magic icoons [317]
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

well, do you just want the old spells and new icons or the new spell book itself?

If you want the new icons and not the new spellbook, then just get toms cache suite at nuke-net.com and just open up your cache, change the pics to the current ones and then repack your cache. (Hard coding it sucks, that is why i chose this way :P) but if you want the new spell book itself, just look up a tut. It is called the search button. if you cant find out that way, try google…

Read full topic
